title: New test
content: Here is another test including some more images

title: Previous build: Corbie 201 mono
content:
This is the Corbie 201 mono, two of these were prepared for customers before Christmas. These speakers feature a mono confuguration, using 2x peerless 3.5 inch woofer, a 1.5 inch peerless mid woofer and a teeny peerless super tweeter.

This punchy speaker is powered by an excellent Wondom JAB 3 2x30 w module, this is programmed to give the best sound from this sealed cabinet design.
Powered by a 3s lithium battery with 32.4Wh using the safe and flexible Wondom BCP2 battery management unit.

Two colourways were made, chalky powder blue satin and matt black, both with contrasting details.
